title: Wine Comes in Six-Packs
description: Many years ago my friends and I would sit around and play what we called 'Jerry Springer: the Home Game', the object of the game was to see how many upcoming shows we qualified for, with the story to support our claim, and whoever had the most at the end of the program won. I was (and still am) the reigning champion. It has been my sincere hope since I first began to write, that when you pick up one of my books I can make you laugh out loud, maybe roll your eyes, groan and shake your head as you eagerly turn the page, wondering where the train wreck will end. I hope this short preview will perk your interest and bring you back in the Spring of 2017, eager to continue following my (mis)adventures in living. And to that end, I invite you, dear reader, to join me on this brief ride of my roller coasterâ€¦
author: Lisa M. Orban
